revisionDesc.change: checked file for values of @facs, further revised header information, revised encoding
changes to TEI header, including punctuation of titles and replacing initials with full names when possible

body.ab: This Department has received your letter of the 18th instant, enclosing receipted account, amounting to $325, for services rendered, and expenses incurred under the direction of the Attorney General.

I transmit herewith a draft on $325 sent
New York for the amount of your account, and request that you will be pleased to acknowledge its receipt.
